mapper.select: select from t_wh_asn asn left join t_bi_customer c on asn.customer_id = c.id left join t_bi_store s on asn.store_id = s.id left join sys_dictionary sys on sys.dic_value = asn.status and sys.group_value = 'ASNSTATUS'

select count(*) from t_wh_asn asn left join t_bi_customer c on asn.customer_id = c.id left join t_bi_store s on asn.store_id = s.id left join sys_dictionary sys on sys.dic_value = asn.status and sys.group_value = 'ASNSTATUS'
